backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, permission checks, and photo storage using blob storage mixin with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two deployment features to affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variants, and global style variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file with build version metadata, preload directives, viewport settings, and Font Awesome inclusion.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes and running a build-version guard with cache refresh logic.
frontend/src/components/HamburgerMenu.ts: Empty placeholder file for a hamburger menu component.
frontend/src/components/HomePlannedDates: Scrollable planned-dates row with auto-drift animation, interaction pausing, and rendering of date pills with color segments.
frontend/src/components/HomeWeeklyCalend: Weekly calendar strip that displays a selectable week, supports navigation, highlights days with moments, and outputs selection events.
frontend/src/components/InlineToast.tsx: Simple fading inline toast that auto-hides after a duration and triggers an optional close callback.
frontend/src/components/MomentsImageCard: Card component showing a moment photo with user info, metadata, reflection text, and feeling indicator.
Clickable pill showing a formatted date with up to three colored background segments.
frontend/src/components/PlannedMomentBot: Bottom sheet for creating a planned moment with date, time, title, and auto‑assigned color, supporting animated open/close.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAutoGeolocation.ts: Hook requesting geolocation once per session and invoking a callback with coordinates when allowed.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login state, stored identities, and AuthClient creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Hook using IntersectionObserver to track whether an element is in view with optional one‑time triggering.
frontend/src/hooks/useMomentsPhotos.ts: Loads moment photos from storage, tracks the most recent photo, and updates state when storage events occur.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlannedMoments.ts: Manages planned moments for a selected date, syncing with storage changes and providing an add-moment helper.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Loads and updates the user profile, with optional auto‑geolocation and event-based profile syncing.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file reserved for future React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark mode colors, scrollbar styles, and custom UI animations/buttons.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/CalendarPage.tsx: Renders a weekly calendar, detecting photo and planned moments per date and opening a bottom sheet on selection.
frontend/src/pages/CameraScreen.tsx: Manages camera usage, photo capture, file uploads, and draft saving before navigating to the confirmation screen.
frontend/src/pages/HomeScreen.tsx: Displays the home layout with calendar strips, planned dates, and navigation, opening a planner bottom sheet on date selection.
frontend/src/pages/MobileSplashScreen.ts: Animated mobile splash screen with swipeable intro cards and Internet Identity login navigation.
frontend/src/pages/MomentFeelingCheckPag: Prompts the user to select a feeling for a saved moment and updates local moment data before returning home.
frontend/src/pages/MomentsPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the moments list page.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile editor supporting name, location, photo upload, and navigation to settings with toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/SaveMomentConfirmPage: Displays captured photo and collects 'who' and reflection inputs before saving the moment and routing to feeling check.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings view with navigation and logout via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/VaultMomentPage.tsx: Displays a single saved moment with metadata and provides navigation back to the vault.
frontend/src/pages/VaultPage.tsx: Displays grouped photo moments by month with lazy‑loaded sections and navigation to individual moment pages.
frontend/src/pages/WelcomePage.tsx: Renders the animated welcome screen and navigates users to the home page when getting started.
frontend/src/utils/buildInfo.ts: Provides build version constants and utilities for verifying, storing, and refreshing cache based on version changes.
Handles localStorage CRUD operations for photo moments, including saving, updating, loading, and retrieving by ID.
frontend/src/utils/pendingMomentDraftSto: Manages temporary sessionStorage drafts and confirmations for the moment‑creation flow.
frontend/src/utils/plannedMomentsStorage: Stores and retrieves planned moments, assigns deterministic colors, and emits change events for UI updates.
frontend/src/utils/profileStorage.ts: Loads and saves the user profile locally, generating an invite code if missing and emitting update events.
frontend/src/utils/timeFormat.ts: Formats timestamps into concise relative time strings or short dates for older entries.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from storage or the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Captures the app’s current product direction, feature inventory, and versioned state description for planning and evolution tracking.
